mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Huffman, Mason
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Newfreeport, Green Co., PA [New Freeport, Greene County, Pennsylvania]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Huffman, Mason Patient Age: 22. Marital Status: Married. Diagnosis: Gun shot flesh wound of the left lateral thoracic region. Bullet entering the inner border of the latissimus dorsi muscle. Opposite the 8th rib passing backwards 2 inches to the left of the 11 dorsal vertebrae. Location Wounded: In act[ion] at Winchester, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/07/20. Nature of Wound: Bullet. Result: Transfer to General Hospital Grafton West Virginia, 1864/09/24.
